AI-UI Interaction for Supporting Out-of-Vocabulary Intent Understanding and Execution in Open-domain Task Assistants

-Proposes an application-independent GUI task assistant capable of executing arbitrary unseen intentions.

-Participation in Tsinghua University Challenge-Cup Competition 2023 and won the 2nd Prize.

Interaction Proxy Manager: Semantic Model Generation and Run-time Support for Reconstructing Ubiquitous User Interfaces of Mobile Services

-Synchronizing and managing the original appsâ€™ interface, and providing a concise programming interface that exposes information and method entries of the concerned mobile services.

-Still under review, manuscript expected to be submitted in May 2023.
